files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+---
+# File: clients_init.yml
+
+#- hosts: clients
+#  sudo: True
+#  tasks:
+#  - name: Create cluster grouping
+#    group_by: key={{ node_role }}
+
+- hosts: clients
+  sudo: True
+  roles:
+  tasks:
+  - name: mkdir /mnt/cbdata
+    command: /usr/local/bin/cbc-pillowfight -U couchbase://52.17.222.121/default --vbucket-start 0 --vbucket-stop 1023 -r 100  -m 256 -M 256 -B 1000 -t 2 -I 100000000
+    async: 100000000000
+    poll: 0 
+

@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+# demo_setup.yml
+
+- hosts: localhost
+  connection: local
+  gather_facts: False
+
+  tasks:
+
+    - name: Provision a set of instances
+      ec2:
+         aws_access_key: AKIAIC733HFOQAYEJJ4Q
+         aws_secret_key: ******************************
+         group: owend2
+         instance_type: c3.xlarge
+         vpc_subnet_id: subnet-5c41ff2b
+         image: ami-d3d5b7a4 #ami-69d04c1e 
+         wait: true
+         region: eu-west-1
+         exact_count: 14
+         count_tag:
+            Name: owend-clients
+         instance_tags:
+            Name: owend-clients
+      register: ec2
+

@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@
+---
+# File: cluster_init.yml
+# Example Ansible playbook to initialize a new Couchbase Server cluster
+
+- hosts: cluster_nodes
+  sudo: True
+  tasks:
+  - name: Create cluster grouping
+    group_by: key={{ node_role }}
+
+- hosts: cluster_nodes
+  sudo: True
+  roles:
+  tasks:
+  - name: mkdir /mnt/cbdata
+    shell: mkdir -p /mnt/cbdata
+  - name: chown couchbase:couchbase
+    shell: chown couchbase:couchbase /mnt/cbdata
+
+- hosts: primary
+  sudo: True
+  vars_files:
+    - ../defaults/main.yml
+  vars:
+    couchbase_server_primary_node: "{{hostvars[groups['primary'][0]]['inventory_hostname']}}"
+  tasks:
+
+  - name: Wait for nodes
+    wait_for: port=8091 delay=7
+
+  - name: Node-init primary node
+    shell: "/home/ubuntu/3.0.3/install/bin/couchbase-cli node-init -c {{ couchbase_server_primary_node }}:{{ couchbase_server_admin_port }} --user={{ couchbase_server_admin }} --password={{ couchbase_server_password }}  --node-init-data-path=/mnt/cbdata --node-init-index-path=/mnt/cbdata"
+
+  - name: Node-init additional cluster nodes
+    shell: "/home/ubuntu/3.0.3/install/bin/couchbase-cli node-init -c {{hostvars[[item][0]]['inventory_hostname']}}:{{ couchbase_server_admin_port }} --user={{ couchbase_server_admin }} --password={{ couchbase_server_password }}  --node-init-data-path=/mnt/cbdata --node-init-index-path=/mnt/cbdata"
+    with_items: groups['additional']
+
+  - name: Initialize primary node
+    shell: "/home/ubuntu/3.0.3/install/bin/couchbase-cli cluster-init -c {{ couchbase_server_primary_node }}:{{ couchbase_server_admin_port }} --user={{ couchbase_server_admin }} --password={{ couchbase_server_password }} --cluster-init-username={{ couchbase_server_admin }} --cluster-init-password={{ couchbase_server_password }} --cluster-init-port={{couchbase_server_admin_port}} --cluster-init-ramsize={{ couchbase_server_ram }}"
+
+  - name: Join additional cluster nodes
+    shell: "/home/ubuntu/3.0.3/install/bin/couchbase-cli server-add -c {{ couchbase_server_primary_node }}:{{ couchbase_server_admin_port }} --user={{ couchbase_server_admin }} --password={{ couchbase_server_password }} --server-add={{hostvars[[item][0]]['inventory_hostname']}}:{{ couchbase_server_admin_port }} --server-add-username={{ couchbase_server_admin }} --server-add-password={{ couchbase_server_password }}"
+    with_items: groups['additional']
+
+  - name: Rebalance cluster
+    shell: "/home/ubuntu/3.0.3/install/bin/couchbase-cli rebalance -c {{ couchbase_server_primary_node }}:{{ couchbase_server_admin_port }} --user={{ couchbase_server_admin }} --password={{ couchbase_server_password }}"
+

@@ -0,0 +1,17 @@
+import json
+import subprocess
+from subprocess import call
+
+
+print "[clients]"
+
+buffer = "ansible -i ../../ansible/plugins/inventory/ec2.py --list-hosts tag_Name_owend-clients"
+out= subprocess.Popen(buffer, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE).stdout.read()
+lines = out.splitlines(True)
+#lines = [line.strip() for line in open('additional_hosts')]
+for s in lines:
+  buf = "../../ansible/plugins/inventory/ec2.py --host %s" % (s)
+  output= subprocess.Popen(buf, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE).stdout.read()
+  j= json.loads(output)
+  print j['ec2_public_dns_name']
+

@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+import json
+import subprocess
+from subprocess import call
+
+
+print "[cluster_nodes]"
+
+buffer = "ansible -i ../../ansible/plugins/inventory/ec2.py --list-hosts tag_Name_owend-primary"
+out= subprocess.Popen(buffer, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE).stdout.read()
+lines = out.splitlines(True)
+#lines = [line.strip() for line in open('additional_hosts')]
+for s in lines:
+  buf = "../../ansible/plugins/inventory/ec2.py --host %s" % (s)
+  output= subprocess.Popen(buf, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE).stdout.read()
+  j= json.loads(output)
+  print j['ec2_public_dns_name'] + " node_role=primary"
+
+
+
+#print "[cluster_nodes]"
+#lines2 = [line.strip() for line in open('primary_hosts')]
+#for s in lines2:
+#  buf = "ansible/plugins/inventory/ec2.py --host %s" % (s) 
+#  output= subprocess.Popen(buf, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE).stdout.read()
+#  j= json.loads(output)
+#  print j['ec2_public_dns_name'] + " node_role=primary" 
+
+
+buffer = "ansible -i ../../ansible/plugins/inventory/ec2.py --list-hosts tag_Name_owend-additional"
+out= subprocess.Popen(buffer, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE).stdout.read()
+lines = out.splitlines(True)
+#lines = [line.strip() for line in open('additional_hosts')]
+for s in lines:
+  buf = "../../ansible/plugins/inventory/ec2.py --host %s" % (s) 
+  output= subprocess.Popen(buf, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE).stdout.read()
+  j= json.loads(output)
+  print j['ec2_public_dns_name'] + " node_role=additional"
+

@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+# demo_setup.yml
+
+- hosts: localhost
+  connection: local
+  gather_facts: False
+
+  tasks:
+
+    - name: Provision a set of instances
+      ec2:
+         aws_access_key: YOUR AWS ACCESS KEY
+         aws_secret_key: YOUR AWS SECRET KEY
+         group: owend2
+         instance_type: c3.xlarge
+         vpc_subnet_id: subnet-5c41ff2b
+         image: ami-23b4d554
+         wait: true
+         region: eu-west-1
+         exact_count: 1
+         count_tag:
+            Name: owend-primary
+         instance_tags:
+            Name: owend-primary
+      register: ec2
+
+
+    - name: Provision a set of instances
+      ec2:
+         aws_access_key: YOUR AWS ACCESS KEY
+         aws_secret_key: YOUR AWS SECRET KEY
+         group: owend2
+         instance_type: c3.xlarge
+         vpc_subnet_id: subnet-5c41ff2b
+         image: ami-23b4d554
+         wait: true
+         region: eu-west-1
+         exact_count: 129
+         count_tag:
+            Name: owend-additional
+         instance_tags:
+            Name: owend-additional
+      register: ec2
+
